pr_title: Cross reference use of Raspberry Pi

timeline.message:
Cross reference use of Raspberry Pi

There is a hardware page related to using Raspberry Pi's GPIO pins.  There is also a separate page for installing JMRI on a Raspberry Pi in the /install directory in the web repository.  I have put in links to cross-reference so that naive user (e.g. me) will realize that these are different and both are possible.

timeline.bodyText:
This statement is wrong.  To use the Raspberry Pi hardware support, you must first install JMRI.  This page is about configuration of that hardware support within JMRI, in other words JMRI installation is a pre-requisite for the hardware support discussed on this page.
This is no different than ANY other system we support.
